hero.title: Desire Club
hero.subtitle: Where Music Meets Passion
hero.description: Experience the ultimate nightlife at Tel Aviv's hottest music club. Live performances, DJ sets, and unforgettable nights.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.description: Experience the best of Tel Aviv's nightlife with our curated events

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Glimpse into the electric atmosphere of Desire Club

about.title: About Desire Club
about.story: Born from a passion for music and nightlife, Desire Club is Tel Aviv's premier destination for entertainment. Our intimate venue combines cutting-edge sound systems with carefully curated programming to create unforgettable experiences.
about.conceptDescription: We believe in creating a space where music lovers can connect, dance, and lose themselves in the rhythm. Every night is a new adventure.
about.vibeDescription: Dark, electric, and alive with energy. Our atmosphere is designed to transport you to another world.

live.label: Live Music
live.description: Experience the raw energy of live performances at Desire Club. Our stage hosts both emerging local talents and established artists, creating an intimate atmosphere where music comes alive. Every weekend features carefully curated live acts that span genres from jazz to electronic.

mom.label: M.O.M
mom.short: MOM is a musical open mic with a live band where anyone can take the stage.
mom.full:
MOM (Musical Open Microphone) is not just a music night, it's a stage for the soul. Every Thursday, our house band opens the stage to anyone who wants to share their musical talent.

Whether you're a seasoned performer or it's your first time on stage, our professional musicians will back you up and help you shine. From jazz standards to contemporary hits, any genre is welcome.

  • Professional house band ready to accompany any style
  • High-quality sound system and stage equipment
  • Supportive and encouraging atmosphere
  • Sign up on arrival - first come, first serve
  • Each performer gets 2-3 songs

Join us for an unforgettable night of spontaneous musical magic!

karaoke.label: Karaoke
karaoke.description: Unleash your inner star at our Karaoke nights. With a state-of-the-art sound system and an extensive song library spanning multiple languages, you'll find yourself in the spotlight of an unforgettable evening.

standup.label: Standup
standup.description: Laugh out loud with Tel Aviv's best comedians. Our comedy nights feature both established names and rising stars, delivering fresh and edgy content in multiple languages.

quiz.label: Quiz Night
quiz.description: "Quiz, Please!" is a team intellectual game where logic, humor, and music collide in seven exciting rounds. You come with friends — you leave with emotions, just like after a party. We play for points, applause, and good vibes. A quiz night is like a beer brain-ring, but with neon lights, dancing, and intrigue.

party.label: Party
party.description: Dance the night away with our resident DJs spinning the best tracks. From electronic and house to hip-hop and mainstream hits, our parties keep the energy high until the early hours.

book.title: Reserve Your Table
book.description: Reserve your table for an unforgettable night at Desire Club. For special requests or group bookings over 20 people, please contact us directly.

questions.question: What's the dress code?
questions.answer: Smart casual to elegant. We recommend avoiding shorts and flip-flops.

questions.question: Do I need to book in advance?
questions.answer: While walk-ins are welcome, we highly recommend booking in advance, especially for weekends and special events.

questions.question: What's the minimum age?
questions.answer: You must be 21 or older to enter. Valid ID required.

questions.question: Do you serve food?
questions.answer: We offer a selection of premium cocktails, spirits, and light bites. Full menu available upon request.

questions.question: Is there parking available?
questions.answer: Street parking is available. We recommend using public transportation or ride-sharing services.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: Looks like this page got lost in the bass drop! The party you're looking for doesn't exist.

error.title: Something Went Wrong
error.message: The music stopped for a moment, but we're getting the beat back.
